div.p:
Artifactory Dependency Viewer is a utility for graphically visualizing Maven2 artifacts dependency graphs.
It is using Maven embedder for resolving dependencies and based the Java Universal Network/Graph Framework (Jung) for creating and visualizing the dependency graph. Spring rich client is used for building the GUI.

ol.li: Visually display Maven2 atifacts dependency graphs.
Filter the displayed dependencies by dependency scope: compile, runtime, test, provided and system.
Save the dependency graph as PNG or JPEG.
Supports 5 types of dependencies graph layouts.
Configure to what depth transitive dependencies should be resolved.
Can use Maven2 settings.xml to configure repositories.

section.name: Building From Source
section.p: Artifactory Dependency Viewer build is based on Maven2 . In order to build the viewer from source you will need Maven2 to be installed on your machine.
To build the viewer from source using Maven2, simply checkout the source and run "mvn clean install".
